features: If you receive products after any unsatisfactory place please contact us, we will give you a satisfactory solution!

Replacement Straws for Stanley Cup: 2 long glass straws, 2 long bent transparent straws plus and cleaning brush. Straw size: 12.2 inch/310mm long and 0.3 inch/8mm wide, Brush size: 12.2 inch/310mm, they are great stanley accessories.
Stanley Straw: Compatible with Stanley 40/30 oz cup adventure travel mugs with handle and other brands of thermal jugs, please confirm the size before purchasing.

Food Grade Glass Straws: CteaTs reusable clear glass straws are made of food grade high borosilicate glass, lead and BPA free, metal free, plastic free, the best alternative to plastic straws, cold and heat resistant, strong and smooth, translucent and shatter resistant.

Easy to Clean: The 12.2 inch straw brush is easy to clean, simply insert it back and forth into the straw to clean it and make sure there is no residual dirt or odor in the tube, they can also be washed in the dishwasher.

Your Satisfaction is Always Our Top Priority: If our glass straws are damaged in transit, or if you are not satisfied with the straws in any way, please contact us as soon as possible and we will help you, we wish you a happy life!
body.description: Experience the ultimate in sipping perfection with our exquisite glass straws. Drink consciously, sip gracefully, and let the glass straw be your companion on the path towards a more sustainable lifestyle. Elevate your sipping experience with the superior benefits of glass straws. Enjoy their friendly nature, pristine taste, and effortless cleaning. Embrace sustainability and style in every si Drinking in a Stylish Way Embrace a Sustainable Lifestyle Offer Unparalleled Purity and Taste Perfectly Compatible with Stanley Cup Must-have accessories with a focus on sustainability

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for 40 oz water bottles
reviews.reviewText: I love that these straws are thicker glass. It feels sturdy & allows a lot of water to pass through so you’re not sipping forever to get water. The longer straw cleaners work great & are easy to use to keep clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you have a Stanley
reviews.reviewText: If you have a Stanley cup you will want one of these! It fits perfectly! Plenty long enough and durable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The color is absolutely beautiful but I have to say they are a lot longer than I would like but I wouldn’t say that’s bad. If you’re looking for a hearty glass straw, these are the ones for you. Super easy to clean. So happy I got them. The packaging for these are great bc you have a protective place to store them in while not being used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and functional
reviews.reviewText: Straws were pretty and functional. I love the ones with a bend in them. I’m glad it included a cleaning brush. Easy to clean the straws. No issue. Gifted these in other colors to others and they also enjoyed them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BYE BYE Plastic Straws
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely hate drinking from plastic straws, they hold the flavor of your last drink and are impossible to clean. These straws are thick and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wanted straws for my 40oz stanley cup and they are the perfect height. Great quality, thick glass, cute colors. They are a little more narrow than the plastic straw that comes with the Stanley so the water flow is a little slower while drinking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my Simple Modern Tumbler
reviews.reviewText: These straws are perfect for the Simple Modern 40oz tumblers. Love that it comes with straight and bent straw options. Easy to clean & great to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit Stanley type cup
reviews.reviewText: This was to fit a Stanley knockoff a family member got for the holidays that straw broke. These are so much nicer and fit perfectly. They are glass. I would not want this for a child. But for an adult it’s a perfect replacement set.
